name: Guys Falling Towards the Sun
description:
Well, these guys are definitely falling.  But you're a nice solar system! Make your planets slide along their orbits, and try to rescue these lost souls! This is a tiny toy I made for an assignment at school.

Mouse-based drag & drop gameplay.

Hold right or middle click to control the camera.

Press R to restart, M to mute, H to hide the planets names.
